sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {UilArrowUp, UilArrowDown, UilTemperature, UilTear, UilWind, UilSun, UilSunset} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import { formatToLocalTime, iconUrlFromCode } from '../services/weatherService'; const TemperatureAndDetails = ({weather: {details, icon, temp, temp_min, temp_max, sunrise, sunset, speed, humidity,feels_like, timezone}}) => { return (

{details}

{`${temp.toFixed()}°`}

Real fell: {`${feels_like.toFixed()}°`}
Humidity: {`${humidity.toFixed()}%`}
Wind: {`${speed.toFixed()}km/h`}

Rise: {formatToLocalTime(sunrise,timezone,'hh:mm a')}

|

Set: {formatToLocalTime(sunset,timezone,'hh:mm a')}

|

High: {`${temp_max.toFixed()}°`}

|

Low: {`${temp_min.toFixed()}°`}

) } export default TemperatureAndDetails
